name: v1_whois
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool whois_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Look up domain registry information using WHOIS protocol for any domain. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/whois.
API description: API Ninjas Whois API endpoint. Returns domain registration details (e.g. registrar, contact information, expiration date, name servers) about a particular domain name.

domain.description: The domain to retrieve WHOIS information for.
